ratings.comment: Great prof.  Interesting, useful lectures.  Assigns a lot of homework, but the exam questions are usually the same/similar to homework problems so make sure to do all the homework.

I noticed that there are no helpful reviews for an upper level math course.  Well, she is very straightforward and gives us rigorous lectures.  The lectures give us all the definitions, theorems, and proofs WITH MANY examples.  The homework is a very good example of what the lectures say, and the midterms are variations on the homework.  DO the HW!

It's a fast moving class, but if you go to lecture and keep up with recommended homework you shouldn't have a problem.  Overall an great teacher, small accent but good at explanations and lots of help for TA's as well.

she has a small accent, but dont worry..shes easy to understand!  she puts all of her lecture outlines on her website so if you print them off, lecture is easy to follow along.  overall excellent professor

For Math144, make sure you print off the lecture notes online for each one of Nencius lectures. She teaches very very slowly and you may catch yourself way ahead of her while doing notes in class if you've taken alg, trig, etc before. Make sure you do well in you discussion. Dont worry about lecture because she is easy to understand.
Kind and helpful professor. Not too hard (lectures, exams, hws).

She's a solid professor.  She puts all of the notes online, or at least the outlines, so during lecture you can focus on listening and copying down the relevant notes instead of the problems.  She is available during office hours and is willing to help you out.  A light accent, but nothing that gets in the way of understanding.  A good instructor.

Best Math teacher I ever had... mind you I haven't had much luck with Math profs here.  Exams were good but were kind of tricky sometimes. It is very easy to make simple mistakes.  This class was for Engineers which I am not.  highly recommend.

Great explanations. You could tell she communicated a lot with the TA to make sure everything was well covered. Fair grader. Available for help. Didn't need this class for my major, but she kept my interest. If you like math profs to wear sandals and socks year round, you'll be disappointed. :)
good notes online, really no help to go to lectures, just read the book. tests are really hard. about 1/2 the class failed the first one.
Not too hard to understand and has notes online, so you dont need to go to lecture, you can just read the book.  Tests are very difficult, must do all homework to do well in this class.
